author: lukaszrozmej
content: Reason: Optimizing code batching to db in separate thread - optimization from perfnet - rare occasion it might not be saved correctly

author: marekm3498

Besides the fix, we have developed an automatic process for this situation (in case a similar bug were to occur). However, since it happened on the testnet, we prefer not to rush the release with recovery.
